Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Manufacturing Associates for Drug Substance Manufacturing, FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you process- and operational-minded, or do you have experience from pharmaceutical production? Do you thrive in a technical and dynamic work environment, with a high work pace? Do you have a strong quality mind and are you passionate about building an in-depth knowledge of biopharmaceutical production, in a strong GMP environment?

Then this position as Manufacturing Associate, at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies, maybe your next dream job

FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies manufactures biological medicines to patients around the world. With the transition to FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies, the manufacturing site in Hillerød is now operating as a Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO). This is an excellent opportunity to join our company at a pivotal time of growth and be part of an exciting journey.

We are therefore constantly looking for new employees for their large-scale production, Drug Substance Manufacturing (DSM). You will work on a day, evening or night shift, 7 days during a 14-day period, including every other weekend.


Tasks

Drug Substance Manufacturing (DSM) includes three departments covering different steps in the biopharmaceutical production such as Media Preparation, CIP, SIP of equipment, expansion of cell cultures, and purification via multiple column steps.

In the position as Manufacturing Associate, you will e.g. work on the following tasks:

  • Execution and revision of cGMP documents
  • Handling and completion of batch documentation
  • In-process measurements and aseptic sampling
  • Execution of validation protocols
  • Read and understand work instructions (in English)
Qualifications & Competencies

We are looking for educated and qualified process operators, process technologists and industrial operators – OR candidates who have acquired solid cGMP/SOP experience in a similar production company, and with solid knowledge of chromatography and filtration processes.

You are very quality-oriented and thorough – and enjoy working with numbers, math and IT tools. In addition to this, it is a requirement that you have good English skills in verbally and written.

The Departments

The common denominator of the Media Prep, Cell Culture and Purification departments is the acknowledgement and development of each employee and the diversity of the employees who have different experiences and educational backgrounds but collaborate closely on getting our medicine safely and quickly to the market. The three departments comprise a number of teams, with 8-10 Manufacturing Associates in each.

The work schedule is as follows:
Week 1: Monday, Tuesday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday
Week 2: Wednesday and Thursday

The working hours are as follows:
Day: 06.00-17.00
Evening: 13.00-23.00
Nat: 20.00-06.00


You are offered

As part of FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies , you will be an active contributor in the advancement of tomorrow’s medicine. We take pride in enriching our communities, caring for our environment and cultivating a world of opportunity for future generations. We invest in you and what you care about, getting the right work-life balance for your health, your family and your professional growth.

FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies offers a healthy work environment that promotes individual responsibility, allowing you to grow and progress. We support our employees with programs that motivate and educate, promoting a healthy work-life balance that ultimately increases personal well-being and employee satisfaction.

We offer a competitive salary package, including pension. In addition, we offer a healthy and smoke-free workplace.


Application
The process is handled by Adecco A / S. If you have the qualifications and motivation for the position, send a motivated application and CV in English.

There are not necessarily open positions right now, but call for interviews on an ongoing basis when the need arises. You must therefore be prepared for the fact that it may take a long time before you are considered.

FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies is a world leading cGMP Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation (CDMO) with over 25 years’ experience. As a world leading CDMO we combine technical leadership in cell culture, microbial fermentation and gene therapies with state of the art GMP manufacturing, from our network of four global locations in the USA, UK and DK. We currently employ over 2,000 dedicated staff who have a reputation for excellent customer service, flexibility and responsiveness.
